abstract: Pres Obama promotes solar energy during speech at National Clean Energy Summit in Las Vegas; announces steps to bolster solar power industry as part of administration's intensifying effort to counter global warming.
lead_paragraph: While promoting the benefits of all renewable energy, including wind power, the president focused largely on solar energy, part of an increasingly intense effort to counter global warming.

headline.main: Obama Flies to the Nevada Desert to Promote Solar Energy
headline.print_headline: Obama Flies to the Nevada Desert to Promote Solar Energy

snippet: While promoting the benefits of all renewable energy, including wind power, the president focused largely on solar energy, part of an increasingly intense effort to counter global warming.
